normalised: Rental Agreements Getting a Makeover, Mumbai Tenants Rejoice!

unnormalised: Rental Agreements Getting a Makeover, Mumbai Tenants Rejoice!
normalised: Folks in Mumbai, especially those living in rented ‘kholis’, are breathing a little easier. New updates to the Maharashtra Rent Control Act are making rental agreements more tenant friendly.

unnormalised: Folks in Mumbai, especially those living in rented ‘kholis’, are breathing a little easier. New updates to the Maharashtra Rent Control Act are making rental agreements more tenant-friendly.
normalised: Gone are the days of arbitrary rent hikes by landlords! Now, Doctor Patil, a leading legal expert, says agreements must clearly state annual increase limits. Plus, sudden evictions? Forget about it! Landlords now need a solid, legally justifiable reason.

unnormalised: Gone are the days of arbitrary rent hikes by landlords! Now, Dr. Patil, a leading legal expert, says agreements MUST clearly state annual increase limits. Plus, sudden evictions? Forget about it! Landlords now need a solid, legally justifiable reason.
normalised: "This is a huge win for tenants," says Sunita Sharma, a resident of Dadar for ten years. "My landlord kept increasing the rent by rupee two thousand every year! Now I have some security."

unnormalised: "This is a huge win for tenants," says Sunita Sharma, a resident of Dadar for 10 years. "My landlord kept increasing the rent by Rs. 2000 every year! Now I have some security."
normalised: Agreements need to clearly specify responsibilities for maintenance, repairs and who foots the bill for the leaking taps and whitewashing.

unnormalised: Agreements need to clearly specify responsibilities for maintenance, repairs & who foots the bill for the leaking taps & whitewashing.
normalised: The standardized agreement formats also make life simpler. No more deciphering complicated legal jargon! The average one B H K flat in Bandra measuring around six hundred square feet now comes with more transparent renting terms.

unnormalised: The standardized agreement formats also make life simpler. No more deciphering complicated legal jargon! The average 1BHK flat in Bandra measuring around 600 sq ft now comes with more transparent renting terms.
normalised: Remember to register your rental agreement to avail these new protections!

unnormalised: Remember to register your rental agreement to avail these new protections!
normalised: So, spread the word and protect your rights! Happy renting!

unnormalised: So, spread the word & protect your rights! Happy renting!
